entry.title: My New Post
entry.content:
Something cool

This is still a test. It’s starting to resemble something I might want to post :–)

(2/3) If you get stuck, look for "pressure points"–scenes you've written that can be unpacked, unraveledâ€¦ (2/3) #NaNoCoach

— NaNoWriMo (@NaNoWriMo) November 5, 2013

Cool, you can directly insert the twitter embed!

now how about some code?

An additional test. More. Yet more.

or a link[http://www.google.com]

Click the image for a larger view.

More like this!

Essence is the beginning of understanding.
